resources.string:
Not a designer nut need to conceptualize your idea? 
 Use 3D software by Trimble©: SketchUp! 
 (free version available for desktop link 
 and viewer for mobiles link ) 
 SketchUp usually applies to: DIY, architectural projects. It is very useful tool for every creative person! Let's get familiar with SketchUp!

SketchUp has only necessary tools to draw primitives (e.g. line, circle etc.) and apply simple operations (move, scale, extrude etc.). You can "Click-drag-release" or \"Click-drag-click\" rule. To enter precise dimensions, you just need to type them using keyboard (e.g. 1\'6\") right after you finished drawing. Use shortcuts:
Use free SketchUp models from 3D warehouse! \n Get to warehouse via \"File/3D Warehouse/Get models…\" or via this link \n Also, remember to share your own models there!
As an example, you can design your dream house with SketchUp. Geolocate your model (File/Geo location/Add location…) to study solar shading. \n Also, 3D terrain to scale will appear in your model.
In need of a personal teacher? Order here: my lessons
